brief.content-text:
The diagram depicts the output of the debug ppp authentication command when the following conditions occur: proper configuration, no user account, and wrong password. Router, R1, is connected via a serial connection to router, R2.

Proper Configuration
03:03:35: S e0/0/1 PPP: Received LOGIN Response from AAA = PASS
03:03:36: %LINEPRONTO-5-UPDOWN: Line protocol on Interface Serial0/0/1, changes state to up

No User Account
03:21:43: S E0/0/1 CHAP: Unable to authenticate for peer

Wrong Password
03:17:47: S E0/0/1 PPP: Received LOGIN Response from AAA = FAIL
